import React,{useState, useEffect }from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col ,Image, ListGroup, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import axios from 'axios' const FoodScreens = ({match}) => { const [food, setFood] = useState({}) useEffect(()=>{ const fetchFood= async() =>{ const {data} = await axios.get(`/api/foods/${match.params.id}`) setFood(data) } fetchFood() }, [match]) return ( <> Go Back

{food.name}

By: {food.owner}

 Description: {food.description}

Location:

 {food.location}

For Contracts and Orders:

 {food.contact} ) } export default FoodScreens
